mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boarding_services VALUES ( null, #{providerCode}, #{title}, #{address}, #{hashtag}, #{introduce}, #{daysCostS}, #{daysCostM}, #{daysCostL}, #{timeCostS}, #{timeCostM}, #{timeCostL}, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE boarding_services SET title=#{title}, address=#{address}, hashtag=#{hashtag}, introduce=#{introduce}, days_cost_s=#{daysCostS}, days_cost_m=#{daysCostM}, days_cost_l=#{daysCostL}, time_cost_s=#{timeCostS}, time_cost_m=#{timeCostM}, time_cost_l=#{timeCostL} WHERE provider_code = #{providerCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM boarding_services WHERE boarding_service_code=( SELECT boarding_service_code FROM( SELECT boarding_service_code FROM boarding_services WHERE provider_code=#{providerCode} )tmp )
mapper.select: SELECT boarding_booking_code, boarding_service_code, user_code, mypet_code, booking_date, boarding_category, check_in, check_out, payment FROM healingdog.boarding_bookings WHERE boarding_service_code IN ( SELECT boarding_service_code FROM boarding_services WHERE provider_code=#{providerCode} )
